book_name = #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isbn = #{isbn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where book_id = #{bookId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update book_info set book_name = #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isbn = #{isbn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, press = #{press,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publication_date = #{publicationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where book_id = #{bookId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
